description: The system does not support logging out and logging back in while maintaining the cart state.
suggested_requirement: The cart should persist if the user logs out and logs back in.

description: No error handling for cases when a user tries to add a product that is out of stock or remove an empty item from the cart.
suggested_requirement: Implement error handling for cases when a user tries to add a product that is out of stock or remove an empty item from the cart.

description: The system may not handle a large number of items in the cart efficiently, causing performance issues.
suggested_requirement: Optimize the cart functionality for efficient handling of a large number of items.

description: No validation to ensure that only authorized users can modify the cart.
suggested_requirement: Implement user authorization checks when adding, updating, or removing items from the cart.

description: The system does not provide a “Proceed to Checkout” button when the cart is empty.
suggested_requirement: Display a “Proceed to Checkout” button only when the cart has at least one item.
